sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['salesoutput.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared RetailDataCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://azuresynapsesa.blob.core.windows.net/default/RetailData/RetailSales.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = RetailDataCSV,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"quantity", Int64.Type}, {"logQuantity", type number}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
